title: The Igloo
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 458 words, Level L (Grade 2), Lexile 490L, Fiction Series
description: The Igloo is a winter story about the Hoppers, a family of rabbits who each have distinct personalities. Children will enjoy meeting Floppy Ears, Speedy Legs, Fluffy Tail, and especially the endearing Snubby Nose, who always feels left out because he is rather funny looking. Mother and Papa Hopper and Grandpa Grizzly round out the story.
highFrequencyWords: chipping, Eskimo, igloo, kettle, toasty, tunneling
